AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented alien: individual being smuggled, involved in a case of reckless endangerment and resulting death during smuggling
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nine undocumented aliens: group of nine undocumented immigrants being smuggled from Mexico to the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.seven other undocumented aliens: additional group of seven undocumented immigrants being smuggled from Mexico to the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nine undocumented aliens and seven other: combined group of nineteen undocumented immigrants being smuggled from Mexico to the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.eighteen undocumented aliens: larger group of eighteen undocumented immigrants, part of a smuggling operation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.nineteen undocumented aliens: total number of undocumented immigrants in the group, involved in a case of reckless endangerment and resulting death during smuggling
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: deceased undocumented female alien, died from heat stroke
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jaime Gomez-Arroyo: individual met by Border Patrol agents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: guide for the group of undocumented aliens, transported them for financial gain and created a substantial risk of death or serious bodily injury
